name: firefox-voice
description: This is a WebExtension that allows the browser to be voice-controlled.

scripts.start: NO_SENTRY=1 npm-run-all maybeinstall maybemarkdown build:manifest start-extension
scripts.build:deps: mkdir -p extension/js/vendor/ extension/css/vendor/ ; for file in lottie-web/build/player/lottie.min.js webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.min.js moment/min/moment.min.js fuse.js/dist/fuse.js raven-js/dist/raven.js react/umd/react.production.min.js react-dom/umd/react-dom.production.min.js; do cp node_modules/$file extension/js/vendor/ ; done ; for file in tailwindcss/dist/tailwind.min.css ; do cp node_modules/$file extension/css/vendor/ ; done ; cp "node_modules/@sentry/browser/build/bundle.es6.min.js" extension/js/vendor/sentry.js
scripts.maybeinstall: if [[ package.json -nt node_modules/last_install.txt ]] ; then npm install && touch node_modules/last_install.txt ; fi
scripts.maybemarkdown: if [[ docs/lexicon.md -nt extension/views/lexicon.html ]] ; then npm run build:markdown ; fi
scripts.package: npm-run-all build:* && web-ext build -s extension --overwrite-dest -i '**/*.ejs' -i extension/tests/ && mv web-ext-artifacts/*.zip addon.xpi ; echo ./addon.xpi created
